catalogue_raissonne: Hagiwara Hideo hanga sakuhin mokuroku 2013, no. 772
description: abstracted landscape with Mount Fuji in purple in LLQ; vertical branching black lines--bare trees?--at right; purple sky with dull orange at low horizon line; lavender and purple section of moon in ULC
inscription: bottom center: 拾遺富士　宵月かかる | LRC, in pencil: 63/100
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Gleanings of Mt. Fuji (Kobore Fuji 拾遺富士)
title: An Evening Moon
